title: emv-bench benchmark metadata
description: Describes an individual benchmark in the evm-bench system.

solc-version.description: Version of the `solc` compiler to use. This should correspond to a Docker tag.

num-runs.description: Number of runs of this benchmark. Balance based on how long the benchmark takes.

contract.description: Path to the contract to deploy and benchmark. Can be relative to the metadata.

build-context.description: Path to the folder to use as context to build this benchmark. Can be relative to the metadata.

calldata.description: Calldata hex to use when calling the contract to conduct the benchmark.
